title: MSDE Cluster Crosswalks

Explore aligned Maryland programs, credentials, and resources. Start with an interest inventory to shape a 6-year plan.

title: About These Crosswalks
content:
## About These Crosswalks

These crosswalk tables provide comprehensive alignment between Career and Technical Education (CTE) programs and various educational standards, career pathways, and industry requirements.

### Features:

- Interactive tables with sorting and filtering capabilities

- Export functionality to Excel for offline analysis

- Detailed program-to-pathway alignments

- Career cluster mappings and industry connections

- Postsecondary education alignment opportunities

### How to Use:

- Click on any cluster button above to view the detailed crosswalk table

- Use the search and filter features within each table to find specific programs

- Export tables to Excel using the download button for further analysis

- Print individual crosswalks using your browser's print function

### Blueprint Alignment & Outreach

We imagine an accompanying website or landing page that provides clear instructions on how to navigate these crosswalks and explains how this work supports the Blueprint for Maryland's Future.

We also envision taking this on a roadshow to engage LEA administrators, counselors, and teachers.
summary: These crosswalk tables provide comprehensive alignment between Career and Technical Education (CTE) programs and various educational standards, career pathways, and industry requirements.

metadata.aria_label: About These Crosswalks section

title: Anne Arundel Community College — Criminal Justice & Law Enforcement
content:
### Anne Arundel Community College — Criminal Justice & Law Enforcement

- **Program**: Criminal Justice & Law Enforcement
- **Institution**: Anne Arundel Community College
- **Sector**: Community College
- **Degree**: AAS
- **Program/Major**: Criminal Justice
- **Lower Division Certificates**: Criminal Justice Certificate, Police Academy Certificate
- **Credential Content in Major?**: Yes - CPR/First Aid, NIMS
- **Source**: https://www.aacc.edu/programs-and-courses/credit/areas-of-study/criminal-justice/
summary: Anne Arundel Community College offers a AAS in Criminal Justice for the Criminal Justice & Law Enforcement program; credentials: Yes - CPR/First Aid, NIMS
